gobi athulu thidenaku miyayama sambandhayen pasugiya dinawala madhya osse wiwidha prachara siduwu bawath, gobi athulu sakakaruwan athadanguwata ganimata hakiyawa labune marthu 05da sita sidukala wimarshanawaladi bawath polis madhya prakashaka jyeshta polis adhikari ajith rohana mahatha kiya sitiyeya.marthu 05da rathriye paleyi polis sthanadhipathiwaraya ekthara sthanayakadi pappa saha postar thogayak ragath pudgalayin kihipadenaku athadanguwata gath bawath ema postarwala demala jathiyata asadharanayak siduwana nisa prathisanwidhanaya wimata awashya bawa demala basin sandahan wi thibu bawath ee mahatha pawasiya.polis mulasthanayedi pereda (16) pawathi madhya hamuwakadi ee mahatha me bawa pawasiya.

han suk-kyu, yonjo raju lesa li je-hun, yu sun lesa, pasuwa kirulahimi sado kumaru wu kim yu-jun, lama siyo ji-dam lesa (kathanga 1-13)[6] yun so-hi, wadihiti ji-dam/pak bige lesa (kathanga 14-24) pak iyun-bin, hyegyon aaryawa lesa kim min-jon, na jul-ju lesa[7] choyi won-yon, che je-gon lesa kim chan-wan, kim thek lesa li won-jon, pak mun-su lesa kan so-jun, min wu-sub lesa siyo jun-yon, shin hyun-bok lesa choyi je-hwan, hiyo jun-wun lesa kim myun-guk, hon bon-han lesa jan hyun-sun, hon gye-huyi lesa kim ha-kyun, kim san-ro lesa um hyo-sup, min bek-san lesa jun mun-sun, byun jon-in lesa jon guk-hwan, li jon-sun lesa kim syun-wuk, jo je-ho lesa bek syun-hyon, shin chi-wun lesa ha syun-ri, jonsun agabisawa lesa li sol, mun suk-uyi lesa, yonjoge upabisawaki son byon-ho, kim sun-ik lesa pak hyun-suk, choyi palikawa lesa kim kan-hyun, jan pandaka lesa kim mi-ran, kim palikawa lesa kim the-hun, kan pil-je lesa li won-je, kan so-won lesa choyi won-hon, um je-sun lesa pak hyo-ju, wun-shim lesa kim bo-ryun, chun wol lesa jun wuk, hyuk-pyo lesa yun chun, jan sam lesa ji san-hyuk, yi sa lesa pak so-iyun, shin go-iyun lesa kwon he-hyo, siyo gyun lesa jun gyu-su, yan sun-man lesa li mi-yon, min palikawa lesa kim yon-sun, hyun-bokge mawa lesa kim han-jun, kosthapal choyi lesa kim hyun, jan siththara lesa yun so-hyun, chun syun-se lesa kwak hi-sun, kim mu lesa sikrat do yanu wiwechanawadi natyayak wana athara, eya kirulahimi sado kumaruge jiwithaye awasan warsha ata nirupanaya kereyi.[2]
